MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA14 and KA15 postcode area of Beith, affecting properties in Main Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:45pm due to repairs being required on a faulty transformer near Gateside Village and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:17pm on Monday, 21 December 2020
